DOC.detailed_description: This non-drug , biomarker study assess utility model repeat nasal allergen challenge subject atopic rhinitis method induce increase response inhale allergen , closely resemble response see hayfever season .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject history seasonal ( intermittent ) atopic rhinitis , age 1840 year . 2 . Otherwise healthy health problem may jeopardize subject participate study , absence history significant allergy . 1 . Smokers ( use tobacco product previous 3 month ) . 2 . Presence respiratory disease history mild stable asthma require treatment associate normal lung function ( FEV1 > 80 % predict screening ) .
